subject: Modify SMACK manifest according three domain model
commitMessage:
Modify SMACK manifest according three domain model

Since SMACK only allows three labels, "_"(floor), "User", "System"
The labels of files are not appropriate

Solution:
- Apply default manifest (request floor label)

Reference site
https://wiki.tizen.org/wiki/Security:SmackThreeDomainModel

Change-Id: Ic472e3e5203967d827186480af914181c1f63d79
Signed-off-by: seong.chung <seong.chung@samsung.com>

Patch Set 1:

The tag submit/{branch}/20131209.075743 was pushed, but it was not completed because of the following reason(s):

- The tag means you want to submit commit 76bc2022ba229723fa7132b5d6853a0e1cad676d in {branch} branch to OBS, but this commit does NOT exist in {branch} branch. Please use correct branch name as version in tag name submit/{version}/{date.time}.

Suggest to use "gbs submit" to trigger submission, or use following command to create tag "git tag submit/${version}/$(date --utc +%%Y%%m%%d.%%H%%M%%S) -m "****" ".

subject: Adjust CMake to use pkgconfig.
commitMessage:
Adjust CMake to use pkgconfig.

Change CMake script to use pkgconfig to solve
dependences instead of direct linking to all
libraries. This fix up build issues.

Change-Id: I14dee52aa6d986b4e017277c42a4abce67a09255
Signed-off-by: Krzysztof Opasiak <k.opasiak@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

To successfully build this package it is necessary to apply https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/10524 patch.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

It needs to apply patch https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/10524 to successfully build this package, but it seems that patch is not merged yet, so I just add "+2" and not submit it, check it please.

Patch Set 1:

Krzysztof Opasiak have to verify https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/#/c/10524/

https://review.tizen.org/gerrit/10524

Patch Set 1: Verified+1 Code-Review+1
